title: Almond Milk (Dairy/Grain/Gluten/Egg/Sugar Free)
directions: Add all ingredients to a blender and blend until completely smooth.

If you're using a high powdered blender like a Vitamix or Blendtec, you don't need to strain the milk. If you're using a regular blender, you will need to strain the milk through a nut bag or cheese cloth in order separate the milk from the nut pulp.
Almond milk will keep in the fridge for a week or two.
If you're using the almond milk to make cheese, do not add any stevia or vanilla extract
ingredients: Vanilla extract or stevia to taste (optional)
Nut milk bag or cheese cloth (optional)
